title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4252.3 - Investment objectives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4252.3 - Investment objectives

State Regulations

The fund objective is to invest in seed stage businesses
through investment entities that are selected by and are under contract to the
corporation. Investment priority shall be given to seed stage businesses
involved in commercialization of research and development or high technology
manufacturing. Notes

4252.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
